PublishMetaData/PublishMetaData.cpp

This sample shows how to create a 3D DWF (DWFToolkit::DWFModel, DWFToolkit::DWFPackagePublisher), use the include library (DWFToolkit::DWFIncludeSegment), create meta data based on the new content definition (DWFToolkit::DWFContentManager), create content presentations (DWFToolkit::ContentPresentationResource) and more.
